languages.text: {n}Этот дразнящий, неуловимый аромат ярости... Это больше, чем смрад. Это — инструмент. Оружие презренной троицы, которым они влияют на разумы мирян. Незримо дурманят их разумы!{/n}

{n}That tantalising, elusive scent of rage... It is more than a stench. It is a tool. The weapon of the despicable trio, which they use to influence the minds of the laity. Invisibly intoxicating their minds!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Этот дразнящий, неуловимый аромат ярости... Это больше, чем смрад. Это — инструмент. Оружие презренной троицы, которым они влияют на разумы мирян. Незримо дурманят их разумы!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}That tantalising, elusive scent of rage... It is more than a stench. It is a tool. The weapon of the despicable trio, which they use to influence the minds of the laity. Invisibly intoxicating their minds!{/n}
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}That tantalising, elusive scent of rage... It is more than a stench. It is a tool. The weapon of the despicable trio, which they use to influence the minds of the laity. Invisibly intoxicating their minds!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}That tantalising, elusive scent of rage... It is more than a stench. It is a tool. The weapon of the despicable trio, which they use to influence the minds of the laity. Invisibly intoxicating their minds!{/n}
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}That tantalising, elusive scent of rage... It is more than a stench. It is a tool. The weapon of the despicable trio, which they use to influence the minds of the laity. Invisibly intoxicating their minds!{/n}
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}That tantalising, elusive scent of rage... It is more than a stench. It is a tool. The weapon of the despicable trio, which they use to influence the minds of the laity. Invisibly intoxicating their minds!{/n}
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ese aroma a furia tan tentador y esquivo... es algo más que un olor. Es una herramienta. Es el arma que emplea un trío despiadado para influenciar a los laicos. ¡Les envenena la mente con ese hedor invisible!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}That tantalising, elusive scent of rage... It is more than a stench. It is a tool. The weapon of the despicable trio, which they use to influence the minds of the laity. Invisibly intoxicating their minds!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ese aroma a furia tan tentador y esquivo... es algo más que un olor. Es una herramienta. Es el arma que emplea un trío despiadado para influenciar a los laicos. ¡Les envenena la mente con ese hedor invisible!{/n}
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}あの掴めそうで掴めない、言い表しにくい怒りの香り…ただの異臭ではない。これは道具だ。いけ好かない3重の武器で、これを使って信徒の心を絆す。目に見えないやり方で彼らの心を酔わせるのだ！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}That tantalising, elusive scent of rage... It is more than a stench. It is a tool. The weapon of the despicable trio, which they use to influence the minds of the laity. Invisibly intoxicating their minds!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あの掴めそうで掴めない、言い表しにくい怒りの香り…ただの異臭ではない。これは道具だ。いけ好かない3重の武器で、これを使って信徒の心を絆す。目に見えないやり方で彼らの心を酔わせるのだ！{/n}
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}那难以捉摸、甜蜜诱人的怒火……它不仅仅散发着恶臭，更是敌人的武器，是那卑劣的三个人的武器。他们使用这种武器影响凡人的思想，悄无声息地毒害他们的心灵！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}That tantalising, elusive scent of rage... It is more than a stench. It is a tool. The weapon of the despicable trio, which they use to influence the minds of the laity. Invisibly intoxicating their minds!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那难以捉摸、甜蜜诱人的怒火……它不仅仅散发着恶臭，更是敌人的武器，是那卑劣的三个人的武器。他们使用这种武器影响凡人的思想，悄无声息地毒害他们的心灵！{/n}
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}Dieser betörende, flüchtige Duft des Zorns ... Er ist mehr als ein Geruch. Er ist ein Werkzeug. Die Waffe des abscheulichen Trios, mit dem es den Verstand der Laien beeinflusst und heimlich ihre Seelen vergiftet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}That tantalising, elusive scent of rage... It is more than a stench. It is a tool. The weapon of the despicable trio, which they use to influence the minds of the laity. Invisibly intoxicating their minds!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dieser betörende, flüchtige Duft des Zorns ... Er ist mehr als ein Geruch. Er ist ein Werkzeug. Die Waffe des abscheulichen Trios, mit dem es den Verstand der Laien beeinflusst und heimlich ihre Seelen vergiftet.{/n}
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ces effluves de rage aussi alléchants qu'insaisissables... Plus qu'une odeur nauséabonde, c'est un instrument. L'arme de l'infâme trio, dont il use pour influencer les pensées des profanes et empoisonner subrepticement leurs esprits !{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}That tantalising, elusive scent of rage... It is more than a stench. It is a tool. The weapon of the despicable trio, which they use to influence the minds of the laity. Invisibly intoxicating their minds!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ces effluves de rage aussi alléchants qu'insaisissables... Plus qu'une odeur nauséabonde, c'est un instrument. L'arme de l'infâme trio, dont il use pour influencer les pensées des profanes et empoisonner subrepticement leurs esprits !{/n}
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion
